column2: GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS

ශ්‍රී ලංකාව සඳහා සාමාන්‍යය කාලගුණ අන්‍ාව: Showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Eastern and Uva provinces and in Hambantota district.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at most places elsewhere over the island after 1.00 p.m.
Heavy showers about 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa and southern provinces.
